service.title: Problem Details for HTTP APIs
service.documentation: This document defines a "problem detail" as a way to carry machine-readable details of errors in a HTTP response, to avoid the need to invent new error response formats for HTTP APIs.

media-type.documentation: The canonical model for problem details is a JSON object. When serialised as a JSON document, that format is identified with the "application/problem+json" media type.
Some HTTP-based APIs use XML as their primary format convention. Such APIs MAY express problem details using the format defined in this appendix.
